scripts.build-getSHE: npm run prebuild && npm run build-getSHEsecret && npm run upload-getSHEsecret
scripts.build-postSHE: npm run prebuild && npm run build-postSHEsecret && npm run upload-postSHEsecret
scripts.build-getE2E: npm run prebuild && npm run build-getE2Esecret && npm run upload-getE2Esecret
scripts.build-postE2E: npm run prebuild && npm run build-postE2Esecret && npm run upload-postE2Esecret
scripts.build-postPublic: npm run prebuild && npm run build-postPublicKey && npm run upload-postPublicKey
scripts.build-getPublic: npm run prebuild && npm run build-getPublicKey && npm run upload-getPublicKey
scripts.build-invalidatePublic: npm run prebuild && npm run build-invalidatePublicKey && npm run upload-invalidatePublicKey
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run combined-build
scripts.build-upload: npm run prebuild && npm run combined-build && npm run combined-upload
scripts.combined-build: npm run build-getSHEsecret && npm run build-postSHEsecret && npm run build-getE2Esecret && npm run build-postE2Esecret && npm run build-postPublicKey && npm run build-getPublicKey && npm run build-invalidatePublicKey && npm run build-login && npm run build-logout
scripts.build-getSHEsecret: export NAME=getSHEsecrets && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-postSHEsecret: export NAME=postSHEsecrets && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*

scripts.build-postE2Esecret: export NAME=postE2Esecrets && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*

scripts.build-getPublicKey: export NAME=getPublicKey && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-invalidatePublicKey: export NAME=invalidatePublicKey && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-login: export NAME=login && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-logout: export NAME=logout && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
